author: {'steamid': '76561198429950380', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 602, 'last_played': 1683484463}
review:
Genial. Me salio lo mismo que 5 caramelos y solo lo habia comprado para subir de nivel mi cuenta. Al final, me lo termine pasando al 100%. Divertidisimo, vine buscando cobre y encontre oro. Miau *guiña el ojo y se va con una nave al espacio*

AHORA SI, hablando en serio. Es un juego casi de estilo móvil que se juega solo con el mouse, utilizando algunos de los clicks. Tiene niveles como si fuera un Candy Crush (tiene aproximadamente 60) 

Este juego, es muy divertido, tanto que si te pones de meta completarlo al 100% te la vas a pasar genial ¿Porque? Bueno, sencillo. Wondercat Adventures es un juego con niveles bien hechos en cuanto a jugabilidad. Niveles que podes llegar a estar casi una hora tratando de pasarlo, ya que tenes que dar el click en el momento justo y mantener tu dedo en el mouse una cierta cantidad de tiempo, para llegar a la próxima plataforma y así superar el nivel, a veces es tan complicado que terminas hasta frustrandote. Verdaderamente es un juego que requiere habilidad y que propone desafios complejos en varios de sus niveles. En cuanto a diseño, no tiene nada que envidiar. A simple vista el diseño de niveles parece hecho en Paint y con sprites muy basicos, pero es lo que le da el toque al juego. Que sea tan sencillo en ese aspecto, hace que lo recuerdes por siempre.

Definitivamente un juego que si esta en oferta, te lo tenes que comprar.

✅PLATINADO (100%)✅

author: {'steamid': '76561198054186778', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 517, 'last_played': 1681759192}
review:
This is a casual little jumping platformer with cute graphics and nice level designs. None of the levels are difficult, they are short and easy to repeat if you mess up. Collecting all the crystals is a bit more challenging, but nothing too bad and not even close to the point of frustration.
The jumping is a bit sluggish, but this fits the game nicely except when dealing with the Golem Boss. This boss was slightly frustrating because it required quicker jumps which the controls often didn't allow. Overall it wasn't a problem and the boss is easy, but the gameplay in this level didn't feel good or well-made.
However, this game is for sure worth the pricetag and I would recommened to anyone looking for a relaxing "jump and collect" game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079199690', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1240, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1657547407}
review:
猫ゲーなので購入。猫じゃなければ買ってなかった。日本語対応になっているがタイトルが「不思議猫の冒険」になっているだけで他は英語。言語が必要な部分は殆ど無いので特に問題ない。ジャンプする長さやタイミングを調節するだけのシンプルなゲームだが難易度は高め。
宇宙服を着ているうえに黒猫なので猫の姿はゲーム中殆ど認識できない。ステージクリア時にアップになってウィンクをする時だけ猫の姿が見える。クリア時に鳴き声が欲しかった。まあ安いので一応おすすめにしておく。

author: {'steamid': '76561198056907421', 'num_games_owned': 1379, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1476391724}
review:
Simple, challenging, quirky, and fun.  I especially love the stylized graphics.

Interactions with platforms aren't always consistent, which can botch collectible runs, but other than that, I don't remember having any issues with this game.

Recommended for casual gamers and precision junkies alike.  ^_^

author: {'steamid': '76561198094638034', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1622292007}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198068074539', 'num_games_owned': 493, 'num_reviews': 856, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1501690875}
review:
WonderCat, hızlı refleksler alan heyecan verici bir koşucu platform oyunudur. WonderCat'in 5 dünya, 50 seviye ve 5 dev patron aracılığıyla eve dönmesine yardım edin. 5 gizli seviyenin ve ekstra başarıların kilidini açmak için parlayan taşları toplayın.


Harika Kedi'nin kedi dostunu bulması ve düştükleri garip madenlerden kaçması için yardımınıza ihtiyacı var! UFO uzay geminizden hiçbir iz yok. Size yardımcı olmak için sadece sizinle birlikte seyahat eden robot bölmesi var. Önünüzdeki tehlikeli ve keşfedilmemiş yola dikkat edin. Bu 55 seviyeden geçmek için tüm dayanıklılığınıza ve hızlı refleksinize ihtiyacınız olacak. Kedi dostun nerede? Mağara nereye gidiyor? Öğrenelim ve eve geri dönelim. Macera şimdi başlıyor!

• Ünlü piksel sanatçısı "Made" in çarpıcı yüksek çözünürlüklü görsellerini içerir
• "Monomer" tarafından bestelenen güzel orijinal müzikler
• 5 büyük patron dahil 55 el yapımı seviye
• Tam oyun, uygulama içi satın alma yok ve reklam yok.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167338797', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 649, 'last_played': 1531370188}
review:
Храбрый Кот (именно так, с большой буквы!), который не боится бросить вызов огню, воздуху, токсическим отходам и даже грибам, - вот он, наш герой! Стоит отвлечься от повседневных дел и вместе с Котом пройти все испытания, уготованные ему судьбой. От наших человеческих лапок зависит, как именно Кот будет преодолевать препятствия, и порой Котика действительно очень жалко. Но лишь стоит взять себя в руки, и он, собрав все топазы, окажется на вершине пьедестала. [b] Что ещё нужно от казуальной игры? [/b]

В целом, уровни довольно просты и большинство из них проходится с первого раза без особых проблем. Главную сложность составляет сбор всех топазов отдельно взятого уровня. В каждом мини-мире есть, как минимум, один уровень, где топазы расположены таким образом, что вы ни за что не сможете собрать их все с первого раза. И не факт, что с десятой попытки это тоже получится. Могу пожелать вам только терпения.

[b] To developers: [/b] please delete a visual effect of clicking mouse, it very much distracts.

[b] И напоследок хочу сказать: [/b] дорогие друзья, не требуйте слишком многого. Это казуальная игра, призванная окунуться в мир 8bit-ной эпохи через призму 21 века. И она прекрасна. <3

9 Храбрых Котиков из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198194680793', 'num_games_owned': 3045, 'num_reviews': 1947, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1497189539}
review: Данный платформер мне понравился. Играем за кота в скафандре. Управлять им мы не можем. Только прыгать. Хоть геймплей и кажется простым, но на самом деле всё далеко не так просто. Особенно если хотите собать все кристаллы на уровнях. Всё дело в тайминге. В игре пять уникальных по стилистике миров с приятной картинкой. Прикольные битвы с боссами. Музыкальное слпровождение тоже радует. Я эту игру прошёл с удовольствием.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 624, 'last_played': 1501730318}
review:
Tags: Casual - Runner
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Where is my gamepad support? Without good out of box experience I have to fall back on the large amount of competing runners who are fully featured.

Review: Great game. I thought the game had fairly good level design, ranging from casual runs to more intense speed runs. Usually coins guide you along, but sometimes they can bait you out of a trickjump so be mindful of that. Its a one button game where you jump from cart to cart. The animation for jumping looks and feels nice, the jumping feels strangely kinetic and satisfying, and there game has an odd sense of emulated physics that was kinda nice. I noticed a slight auto correct in speed levels where the platforms would sometimes alter when and how they start their motion to match the arc of my jump as an ease of use casual jump assist which I suppose is a good or a bad but I thought it cut down on frustration. I thought the game audiovisually made an incredibly strong showing for games of this flash/tablet category. The casual and simplistic one button nature of the gameplay DEMANDS GAMEPAD, as this kind of experience is hard to justify as a sit down PC entertainment experience and is way more suited for the couch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071918779', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1500033870}
review:
スーパーマリオランみたいに、横スクロールは自動でされて、クリック１つでジャンプだけ。
でも、凄く楽しいんですよ。
ジャンプしながら、クリスタルを取ったり、トロッコからトロッコに乗り移るんですけど、
クリスタルを取れるジャンプ、トロッコに乗り移れるジャンプをすれば、確実にトラップを回避できたり、
次のアクションに繋げる事ができるので、僕みたいな下手ゲーマーでも自分がTASプレイしてるんじゃないかと
感動すら覚えました。（ちょっと大げさか…。）
セールでしたら買ってもいいと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198044679174', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1495996066}
review: Очень интересная игра, управление в которой осуществляется одной кнопкой мыши, но это действительно интересно! Все что нашему протогонисту (кот в механическом скафандре) предстоит - это прыгать на платформы. Постоянно прыгать... и ещё собирать кристалики. 5 разнообразных уровней с 9 подуровнями и одним боссом. Игра не настолько сложна, как написано в других отзывах, сложнее всего собрать все кристалики. В игре присутствует приятная графика, рисовка и музыка. Что порадовало - нет долбонутых уровней, которые почти невозможно пройти. За 5,5 часов собрал все ачивки, при этом особых подгораний не было. Так что однозначно рекомендую к покупке!

author: {'steamid': '76561198111032039', 'num_games_owned': 450, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1488831338}
review:
its a very nice game, simple, fun, challenge, have a nice soundtracks, beautifull artwork, really nice.
its basicly jump, you nedd to just jump by click in mouse, but its not so easy, when you see the levels is ore difficult and are some puzzles to be solved for advanced levels.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058584412', 'num_games_owned': 9611, 'num_reviews': 204, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1488243271}
review: It works ok, other than a few issues where you seem to go through things.  If you have the patience for it, and it looks like fun, I doubt you'll be disappointed.  Many of the crystals I missed were when the game was catapulting me, which is something that should never happen when I don't have control over the character.  Ultimately, though, I just got bored of playing the same 40-60 seconds or more over and over because of one difficult part near the end of the level where you had to click at just the right time and I couldn't get it.  At that point in time the game just became more of a chore than a fun time, so I stopped.  I can see how this would work well on a phone or tablet, and I'd encourage you to just get the game there, and play something a bit more deep on your PC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030002215', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1709452677}
review:
First time review. I have always had a low opinion of mobile games with their single click interface, so when I bought this game after 48 hours of no sleep I wondered what had come over me. Maybe I had been drunk? Food poisoning? Illicit drugs? What ever the cause I was exceedingly happy with the result. The gameplay is relaxing, the music has a soporific effect and the art is vibrant. But more importantly the setting is so wonderfully absurdist that I cannot even fathom where the idea came from.
It makes me wonder, who is this cat? Where did he get his walking tanks/spaceship? Is he trying to get to his mothership? Is he trying to rescue this planet of mutated creatures? I think this is one of the most fun platform games I have ever bought and recommend it to anyone who would wish to spend a quiet evening of relaxation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018061433', 'num_games_owned': 1510, 'num_reviews': 1588, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1467891169}
review:
+ Grafik
+ Sound
+ reine Maussteuerung
+ viele Level/Welten
+ sammelbares
+ Boss Gegner




Mit reiner Mausteuerung bewegen wir die Katze mit Sprüngen zum Ausgang. Diese Sprünge können wir per Klick länger oder kürzer machen. Das ganze wird laufe der Level zum Reflexionstest, da es ein recht schnell Plattformer ist. Nebenbei kann man noch Edelsteine einsammeln um Errungenschaften zu erreichen. Durch dieses Gameplayprinzip wird das Game zum Gelegenheisspiel. Und das zu simple Gameplay sollte man nicht bemängeln, da es nun mal für zwischendurch geeignet ist. Und es ist natürlich im Angebot noch interessanter ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198035383340', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 243, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1463368392}
review: WonderCat Adventures. Like Wonder Women but a cat??? nah. This is SPACE KITTY in a rad 3 legged super robot, on a mysterious planet, looking for his kitty friend.  A simple one click platformer game, that all you do is jump jump jump to get though the levels and collect gems. Levels put you through the typical jump over, under, on and through fire, air, mechanical deathtraps and baddies like bats, on a giant cart system. The cart railway is just there with this cart and you use it. The collections for gems, I don't know why... maybe for his kitty friend? or fuel for his rad 3 legged super robot? The music is upbeat and the graphics are pretty clean cut with a style I personally liked. The chill looking black cat in his rad 3 legged super robot is nifty. I do wish there was lasers or something epic added, but it'll do.  Bosses like giant crabs are interesting and different. For a fun, little, simple, click, adventure I think it's a good game. Especially for all those cat enthusiasts and crazies out there that need a cat super hero. WONDERCAT IS HERE!!!! With 50 something levels and 5 worlds and 5 bosses, it'll keep you busy for a while.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135177249', 'num_games_owned': 611, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 302, 'last_played': 1462798748}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025057920', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1670883321}
review:
Venez sauver le chat le plus swag de la galaxy !

Un poil déçu par le dernier boss, pas aussi impressionnant (à mon goût) que les précédents.
Mais si vous arrivez jusqu'à lui, cela signifie que :
- vous pouvez être fier de vous car vous êtes parmi les 2% de joueurs les plus persévérants (Ce n'est pas Mario Lost Levels, mais il y a quand même du challenge plateformesque !)
- vous avez pu apprécier l'ambiance magique, enchanteresse des 54 niveaux précédents

Le meilleur rapport rapport qualité(artistique)/prix de steam.

[spoiler]Le vrai challenge c'est de finir les niveaux à 100% pour débloquer les niveaux cachés ![/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198044998852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1459778014}
review: Frustrating but fun, and reaaaaaaaaaaaaally pretty =w=

author: {'steamid': '76561198084968781', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1463452210}
review:
Absolutely purrfect! ;)

- There's a cat in a robo suit
- Awesome level designs 
- The boss stages are creative and amusing
- Fantastic music & sounds
- MEOW THERE'S A CAT
- Simple gameplay, great for casual play (some levels do get more difficult!) 
- Very addicting 
- Did I mention cat? =^-^=

To those of you who are rating this poorly, just because it's simple doesn't mean it doesn't belong on steam...
Also, it's an inexpensive game that is fun to play when you're bored. It's great to play for short or long periods. I think overall it's great, people just expect way too much for a game that is such low cost and simple. Chill out!

author: {'steamid': '76561198109883351', 'num_games_owned': 1814, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1451299921}
review:
[ Fun: 2 | CTRL: 6 | GFX: 8 | SFX: 8 | Stable: Y | Replay: 2 ] [ Total : 3/10 ]

One of the best looking and sounding games I cant recommend on the PC.

+ Looks and sounds amazing
+ Jump mechanic is simple and works
+ Bosses make surprisingly clever use of the limited mechanics

~ Level design is ok
~ Gameplay is just too simple to enguage for long

- Gameplay is just too simple to be enguaging for long
- Low res and simple play indicate a phone port for which it is perfectly suited

author: {'steamid': '76561198070205606', 'num_games_owned': 4178, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1450162260}
review: Looks nice, sounds nice, but i found it too frustrating for casual play and not engaging enough for anything more.  The jumping didnt feel right to me at all which led to deaths that i felt were not deserved and then its right back to the start of the level.   Perhaps with longer play you can get better adjusted... but I got really annoyed trying to collect the crystals of a particular level where you cant actually collect the crystals.   Most of the crystals require jumping for the correct amount of time, but this part shoots you on to a pendulum which swings down missing the crystals along its path.   If you try to jump to grab them, the pendulum just continues on its path without you.  Such poor design at an early level is offputting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056112123', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1442769414}

author: {'steamid': '76561198041904163', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1448477357}
review:
This is a fun little game. For those complaining that it's "boring" because of limited controls, what do you expect from a mobile port?

The art and music are pleasing to the ears and eyes. I didn't notice any game-breaking lag or control issues. For a couple bucks on sale, it's a good time killer to pick up every now and then when you don't feel like focusing a whole lot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040757002', 'num_games_owned': 897, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1453417424}
review:
You want to know what's fun about this game?
The cool music!
The rad level layouts!
The awesome character design!

You want to know what's not fun about this game?
Bat Jumping. That level is garbage, there's like a 50% chance you'll actually make it to the next platform if you land on the bat like you're supposed to. This level wasn't fun, it was cheap.

Other than that one particular level, this game is great!  8/10

Edit: Actually, all sections where you have to jump on bats seem to be broken. So if you're at a part where there's bats... I gotta say it's a solid 7/10

Edit (again): Wow, they still haven't fixed the parts with the bats... seriously?? 5/10 I guess?

Edit (again again): well... as someone who's played over 6 hours of this garbage game... They Breathe is about the same price, but doesn't have any annoying bugs

author: {'steamid': '76561198241309916', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1447901112}
review:
Very nice game, with a great cohesive art style.  Obviously a mobile port but I knew that going in.  THe gameplay is pretty shallow but that comes with the territry

What I didn't expect is controls that are this unresponsive.  THeres really no excusve for that especially considering this game was meant to run on iphone clearly.  Disappointing

author: {'steamid': '76561198106050701', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1445972506}
review: Nice game! Easy controls and it's perfect when you like to chill. Mostly easy but very nice to play and watch someone else's  playing.  Unique bosses, nice art and style, beautiful backgrounds, very good soundtrack. Only I missed Wondercat's backstory. Who's wondercat? Why she/he was on her/his journey? What happened after the last boss fight? Except Wondercat goes home?

author: {'steamid': '76561198037166965', 'num_games_owned': 1508, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1442486399}
review:
[h1]WonderCat is adorable, a game to buy without thinking twice![/h1]
Congratulations to the developer, if you're interested I made a little video of the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_u1JzGoHN4M

[h1] (Below is the Italian full review)[/h1] 

WonderCat è un emozionate runner-platform, che prevede riflessi rapidi.
Bisogna aiutare WonderCat a tornare a casa attraverso 5 Mondi, suddivisi in 50 livelli e 5 grossi Boss.
Raccogli tutte le pietre incandescenti, per sbloccare 5 livelli segreti ed altri extra!

[h1]Feature:[/h1]
- Grafica in alta definizione, dal famoso artista del pixel "Made"
- Musiche originali composte da "Monomero"
- 55 Livelli fatti a mano con 5 Enormi Boss!
- Gioco completo, senza acquisti ulteriori e nessun annuncio pubblicitario.

[h1]Parere:[/h1]
WonderCat Adventures è uno di quei giochi che vi tiene "incollati allo schermo" sia perché bisogna essere precisi per ogni salto sia perché spesso, ci sono così tante cose a schermo che risulta difficile finire il livello alla prima run.
Divertente e graficamente molto colorato, al costo di 2.99 ci si porta a casa un bel giochino, per niente semplice, che risulta anche rigiocabile per sbloccare il tutto.
Ah e i boss sono veramente geniali e ben fatti!

Consigliato!
[h1]Voto: 7/10 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198240304434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 9647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1448470632}
review: Very cool graphics and sounds but that doesnt' change the fact that this is clearly a mobile game on steam.  When you have an entire keyboard and mouse available it's pretty ridiculous to have controls this simple.  Should be free to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017960490', 'num_games_owned': 745, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1450585179}

author: {'steamid': '76561197985036092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1442323939}
review:
Crash landing and losing his buddy, WonderCat sets out to find them riding a minecart through 5 different worlds. Levels generally provided new challenges, from carts running slower or faster to reversing direction of travel. Overall not a difficult game but enough to keep things fresh. Lovely artwork, decent soundtrack, responsive 1-button mouse control and a fair price point make this an easy recommend for a casual night of platforming in space, with a cat. :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TEqRSlc4zNU
